content:
Thanks for your feedback. Your suggestion fixed the latest problem. Much appreciated.

I am encountering so many issues with the latest update however that I am seriously considering dumping Thunderbird or reverting back to previous version.
creator: hireme1

content: May as well try a new profile - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/profile-manager-create-and-remove-thunderbird-profiles.
creator: siffemoz

content: If I create a new profile, what happens to all the messages I've collected in mail folders?
creator: asmusf

content: See if it appears in the console - ctrl-shift-j (or maybe cmd vs ctrl).
creator: siffemoz
